name: Tyler vs the matrix
description:
Tyler D has a fight with Agent Smith in the matrix.

I ran out of time so the game has no real ending. Just beat up the agents.

CONTROLS

AD - left/right

SPACE - jump/jump attack

SHIFT - attack

CREDITS

Background - https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/151563-random-numbers-matrix-background (advikblue)

SFX - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/kick-and-pun...

Font - https://www.fontspace.com/mega-man-10-font-f24057 by megaman
